017package ninja.leaping.configurate.objectmapping;
018
019import com.google.common.reflect.TypeToken;
020
021/**
022 * Extension of {@link ObjectMappingException} for instances where the present {@link TypeToken type}
023 * is invalid.
024 */
025public class InvalidTypeException extends ObjectMappingException {
026    public static final long serialVersionUID = 6063916638575438044L;
027
028    public InvalidTypeException(TypeToken<?> received) {
029        super("Invalid type presented to serializer: " + received);
030    }
031
032}
